pages.title: Blaster
pages.text: $(#25228d)Doom-shrooms destroy everything in a large area and leave a crater behind.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Leaves a crater on the block it exploded for 2 minutes.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)"You're lucky I'm on your side," says Doom-shroom. "I could destroy everything you hold dear. It wouldn't be hard."
